name: gvdr's homepage
tagline: giulio valentino dalla riva very own web page
body:
### Under, slow, construction.

Hi there, this is Giulio Valentino Dalla Riva. Nice to meet you.

This is a web page under slow construction: there's not much to see here.
Just a remainder that this will be the place for it.

If for any reason you are interested in contacting me about my ongoing research, I am indeed a PhD fellow at the Biomathematical Research Centre - University of Canterbury, you should probably send me an email or make a phone call.

```
gvd16 [at] uclive.ac.nz
+64 3 364 2987 ext 4869 [that's New Zealand prefix]
```

See you soon, mate!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
